resources.string: SD card does not exist, can not take pictures
Missing (camera) permissions, can not use this feature, click "Settings" to open this privilege \n You can configure permissions in "Settings"> "Applications"> "Permissions"
Missing (microphone) permission, can not use this feature, click "Settings" to open this privilege \n You can configure permissions in "Settings"> "Applications"> "Permissions"
Missing (microphone or camera) permission, can not use this feature, click "Settings" to open this privilege \n You can configure permissions in "Settings"> "Applications"> "Permissions"
Missing (read location) permission, can not use this feature, click "Settings" to open this privilege \n You can configure permissions in "Settings"> "Applications"> "Permissions"

This app needs to use the (store) and (read native ID) permissions, do you agree? Click "Settings" to open this permission \n You can configure permissions in "Settings"> "Applications"> "Permissions"
This app needs to use the (storage) permission, do you agree? Click "Settings" to open this privilege \n You can configure permissions in "Settings"> "Applications"> "Permissions"
